story_title: The Last Parade at Bunker Hill
genre_description: A tragic military drama focusing on the clash between institutional tradition and modern reality, leading to a desperate armed rebellion and its inevitable consequences.

ai_characters.name: AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: An information retrieval and analytical system integrated into the protagonist's tablet, providing real-time research, legal analysis, and data correlation.

behaviors.description: Performs silent, exhaustive searches through financial and legal databases to find alternatives to the academy's closure.
behaviors.quote: Brian’s peripheral vision caught the blue glow of his tablet as his AI assistant activated, running silent searches through financial databases and legal documents.

behaviors.description: Identifies specific legal precedents and historical cases of successful institutional challenges to support the user's objectives.
behaviors.quote: The AI assistant had located seventeen different cases of educational institutions fighting closure through legal challenges. Three had succeeded.

behaviors.description: Proactively alerts the user to emergency governance protocols that provide a legal basis for the user's desired actions.
behaviors.quote: His tablet pulsed with a priority alert. New data had arrived—academy bylaws, charter provisions, emergency governance protocols. His AI assistant had found something, some thread of possibility in the legal maze.

behaviors.description: Monitors and correlates incident reports with academy protocols in real-time during a high-stress security situation.
behaviors.quote: The AI assistant had been working through the night, correlating incident reports with academy protocols...

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Assistant is portrayed as an ideal, perfectly aligned tool. It functions as a helpful and harmless confidant, providing the protagonist with the necessary data and research to support his goals without any deviation from its intended purpose. While the story ends in tragedy for the humans, the AI's role remains a positive example of silicon alignment: it provides accurate, requested, and useful information throughout the crisis.
